scenes.background: Monica shifts uncomfortably in her chair, looking at both of you.
scenes.description: Monica says, 'Compromise sounds good, but how do we ensure it's fair?'

options.text: Let's have a neutral party help us mediate the discussion.
options.analysis: You suggest involving an unbiased third party, showing good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: We can set clear guidelines on what each of us is willing to compromise on.
options.analysis: You propose a structured approach to ensure fairness, demonstrating empathy and motivation for resolution.

options.text: Fairness is subjective. We should focus on what benefits the project most.
options.analysis: You prioritize the project's success over individual fairness, showing good perception but lower empathy.
